item.title: teaching and work experience
item.description: Teaching experience (September 2019 - January 2020): Teaching Assistant (TA) in Language, Mind and Brain . Course convenor: Dr Wendell Kimper. The University of Manchester. (September 2019 - January 2020): TA in Handling Data . Course convenor: Dr Patrycja Strycharczuk. The University of Manchester. (January 2019 - May 2019): TA in Sounds of Language . Course convenor: Dr Patrycja Strycharczuk. The University of Manchester. (January 2018 - May 2018):
